The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 17 August is 2,860 (331 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 August, there were 27 new confirmed cases (3.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 August, there were 21 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 29% (6 extra cases).
